channel.title: Laggy/Jumpy Java Help! ~EDITED: HAS MORE INFORMATION NOW!~
channel.description: [s]When I run a Java application such as moparscape or when I run my client useing Java I experience a slight pause every 1 second in the Java application. Please help.[/s] [shadow=red,left]READ EDIT INSTEAD[/shadow] Thanks for your time. -Jim [b][size=12pt]Some more info EDIT: I have a jumpy Java issue... when I am running my server any Java, flash, or really any application that is open has a slight pause every 1 second. I used to run a PS v317 from this computer a long time ago and I never had that problem, but recently I factory restored my PC to the original settings it came in because I had to much clutter, so I re-installed Java v21 and JDK v21 (the latest versions) and even upgraded my graphics card. Do you have any suggestion on what to do to fix the issue?[/size][/b]

item.title: Laggy/Jumpy Java Help! ~EDITED: HAS MORE INFORMATION NOW!~
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

To be honest, I don’t think it’s anything to do related Sever wise, I think it’s something to do with your Computer, maybe too much Memory taken up? or so on.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Laggy/Jumpy Java Help! ~EDITED: HAS MORE INFORMATION NOW!~
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

When I run a Java application such as moparscape or when I run my client useing Java I experience a slight pause every 1 second in the Java application. Please help. [shadow=red,left]READ EDIT INSTEAD[/shadow]
Thanks for your time.
-Jim
[size=12pt]Some more info EDIT: I have a jumpy Java issue… when I am running my server any Java, flash, or really any application that is open has a slight pause every 1 second. I used to run a PS v317 from this computer a long time ago and I never had that problem, but recently I factory restored my PC to the original settings it came in because I had to much clutter, so I re-installed Java v21 and JDK v21 (the latest versions) and even upgraded my graphics card. Do you have any suggestion on what to do to fix the issue?[/size]

Read full topic
